definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: frankincense (from white colour, cf. Lag:BN 33; NH id.; Aram. id., [[לְבוּנְתָּא]], lbuwnto0 Ph. [[לבנת]]; Ar. luba0nun (Lane:3007); Eth. lib4nos: is fr. libanov);—´[[ל]] Ex 30:24 + 18 t.; [[לְבׂנׇתָהּ]] Le 2:2, Le 2:16; —used in prep. of holy incense Ex 30:34 (‖[[סַמִּים]]); used as incense Je 6:20, on meal-offering Le 2:1, Le 2:2, Le 2:15, Le 2:16, Le 6:8, cf. Le 5:11, Nu 5:15, also Je 17:26, Je 41:5, Is 43:23, Is 66:3; with shew-bread Le 24:7; Ne 13:5, Ne 13:9, 1Ch 9:29 (‖[[בְּשָׂמִים]]); burned as perfume (art. of luxury) Ct So 3:6 (‖[[מׂר]]); [[גִּבְעַת הַלְּבוֹנׇה]] So 4:6 (‖[[הַר הַמּוֹר]]); [[עֲחֵי לְבוֹנׇה]] v:So 4:14 (‖[[נֵרְדְּ]], [[כַּרְכּׂם]], [[קָנֶה]], [[קִנׇּמוֹן]], [[מׂר]], [[אֲהָלוֹת]]); as tribute to Zion Is 60:6 (‖[[זהב]]).—In Hex only P.
